job.title: Pega Developer
job.description:
Actively hiring - Pega Developers - Remote - Long term


Shakti Solutions has been providing IT services to fortune 500 clients since 1999. We service a wide range of clients in the public and private sectors, which include Healthcare, Healthcare Insurance, Multimedia, Communication, Medicare, Medicaid, Judiciary, Child Support, etc.


Position - Pega Developers

Start Date - ASAP

Duration : Long term

Location : Remote


If this sounds like an opportunity you would like to learn more about, I would love to share the details! Please let me know the best time and number to reach you. Please also feel free to pass along my contact information ( sguruprasad@shaktisolutions.com) if you know of anyone in your network who may be interested. We offer excellent referral bonuses on successful placements.


Happy to help and hope to hear back soon
